_header: The kings banners beth forth I-led
Subjects: hymns, to Christ; Christ, hymns to; translations
_description: William Herebert, Vexilla regis prodeunt — fourteen couplets

BLAdd46919.First Lines: Þe kynges baneres beth forth yladþe rode tokne ys nou to sprad…
BLAdd46919.Last Lines: …Hoem þat þou bouhtest on rode treeHoere wyssere euermore þou be
